column2: Sunny- one loon present- ice out April 1st- leaf out on trees- fairly calm with a light breeze.  Macro invertebrates collected include dragonfly nymph- mayfly larva- scud- damselfly larva- orb snail and banded mystery snail.

No loons present- aquatic plants collected include coontail- clasping leaf pondweed- wild celery- northern water milfoil- whorled water milfoil- bushy pondweed- elodea canadensis- fern pondweed and watershield.
